job.title: Software Engineer, Frontend
job.description: strongAt Feather our mission is to transform peoples relationship with material goods to create a healthier and happier planet We are redefining furniture rental for city living and helping people feel at home no matter where they live or how long they plan on staying By giving people smarter options Feather is able to keep more furniture in homes and out of landfillsbrbrstrongstronguAbout This JobbrbrustrongWe are looking for a talented Frontend Software Engineer to join our team We have positions open on several different teams covering all aspects of our business everything from a heavy frontend consumer focus to a heavy backend operations focus and several points in between This position is for those who are experienced in the frontend and can help advocate architect and design scalable client solutions make major changes to our entire user experience and get their hands dirty with datastate management on a granular levelbrbrstronguWhat Youll Dobrustrongul liFocus on user experience and create UIs that are scalable intuitive and add value for users of all kindsli liWork in a distributed architecture consisting of APIs and messageevent consuming microservicesli liBegin to take ownership of larger initiatives collaborating with other engineers to deliver project epicsli brbrulstronguRequirementsbrustrongul li3 years of experience building commercial software with a modern programming languageli liAn eagerness to join a fastpaced growing and evolving environmentli liExcellent analytical and problemsolving skillsli liStrong experience creating rich user applications with modern frontend frameworks such as React Angular or Vue and modern state management tools such as Reduxli liStrong experience working with RESTful APIs as well as noSQL data models and GraphQLli brulstrongTechnology Stack brbrstrongYou dont need to have experience with all of these Were looking for talented and smart engineers who are willing to ramp up on these technologiesbrul liFrontend React Redux Saga Typescript GraphQL Storybook Emotionli liBackend Express NestJS RESTful APIs GraphQLli brbrulustrongBenefitsbrstronguul liCompetitive compensationli liHealth vision dental and life insuranceli li401k commuter benefits and HSAFSAli liFlexible vacation and paid time offli liA monthly stipend to support remote workli liA 50 discount on your own Feather subscriptionli liThe latest hardware to get the job doneliul
